entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Rain over northern sections early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
